organisation_name: Conseil des investisseurs européens au Sénégal (CIES)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
The purpose of the association is to promote and develop direct European investments or 
in Senegal. 
For the present, it is understood by "European countries" the member countries of the European Union and the 
Swiss.
relevant_communication:
Celebration of the general assembly. 
Elaboration of the annual survey in order to measure the impact of European companies in the field of participation in GDP, number of people hired, contributions to tax revenues. 
Celebrate lunch discussions and TEDX to promote a favorable business climate and communicate with our members on topics of economic interest.
